name: C# Labyrinth Explorer
description:
So over the past few day I have been having fun creating a game from scratch based on the board game Betrayal at House on the Hill! Explore this endless procedural single player adventure.

I still have a lot of work to do on it but feel free to let me know what you think, and what you might like to see in the project. The project is also open source so you can take a look at the code! So far the game is designed to be played in the console like an old text adventure game. 

Have fun and enjoy this small game!
